data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Brentford.
Brentford's Henrik Dalsgaard gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Brentford to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 4, In London Fulham drive forward through Joshua Onomah. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Brentford.
Brentford have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 7, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford.
In London, Bryan Mbeumo of Brentford is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Brentford at Wembley Stadium.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a Brentford throw-in in Fulham's half.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Fulham push forward at Wembley Stadium and Joshua Onomah gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brentford defence.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Brentford's area.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brentford's Ollie Watkins is whistled for offside at Wembley Stadium.
Fulham pushes forward through Joshua Onomah, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 18, Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Important block from the Brentford defence as Bobby Reid fires in a strike for Fulham.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 22, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Brentford needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Bryan Mbeumo (Brentford) strikes at Wembley Stadium but his header is cleared.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Brentford.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford.
In the minute 29, Harrison Reed (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Fulham.
Throw-in Brentford.
In the minute 34, Can Brentford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Bryan Mbeumo of Brentford smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Martin Atkinson signals a Brentford throw-in in Fulham's half.
Aboubakar Kamara of Fulham is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 40, Fulham push forward at Wembley Stadium and Denis Odoi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brentford defence.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 42, Fulham drive forward but Neeskens Kebano is judged offside.
Brentford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brentford at Wembley Stadium.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
The first half has been concluded at Wembley Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Wembley Stadium.
Throw-in Fulham.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 48, Neeskens Kebano of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Martin Atkinson awards Brentford a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In the minute 52, Said Benrahma (Brentford) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Fulham at Wembley Stadium.
Free kick Fulham.
In the minute 54, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Martin Atkinson awards Fulham a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a Fulham throw-in in Brentford's half.
In the minute 59, Bobby Reid for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Brentford have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Emiliano Marcondes is on a sub for Bryan Mbeumo for Brentford.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brentford's half?
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Fulham's Michael Hector misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Brentford goal kick.
Brentford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Brentford.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Brentford.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford just outside Fulham's area.
Tom Cairney for Fulham has been booked by Martin Atkinson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Brentford's Emiliano Marcondes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Fulham at Wembley Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 71, Brentford's Ollie Watkins is on target but unsuccessful.
Brentford have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 73, Fulham are coming forward and Harrison Reed gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Brentford at Wembley Stadium.
Brentford to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Brentford at Wembley Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Brentford, close to Fulham's area.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford.
In the minute 80, Can Brentford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Fulham make their first substitution with Anthony Knockaert replacing Neeskens Kebano.
Aboubakar Kamara for Fulham is whistled offside.
In the minute 83, Brentford are pushing forward but Henrik Dalsgaard's finish is wide of the goal.
Martin Atkinson awards Fulham a goal kick.
Brentford make their second substitution with Sergi Canos replacing Joshua Da Silva.
In the minute 84, Fulham's Anthony Knockaert has run offside.
Joshua Onomah of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brentford goal kick.
In the minute 86, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Fulham.
Mathias Jensen (Brentford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Martin Atkinson will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson blows against Fulham's Aleksandar Mitrovic for offside.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
It's 0-0 at the end of normal time.
Aleksandar Mitrovic is replacing Bobby Reid for Fulham at Wembley Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the first extra period.
Brentford's Ollie Watkins breaks free at Wembley Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Martin Atkinson awards Fulham a goal kick.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brentford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fulham drives forward and Aboubakar Kamara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Fulham at Wembley Stadium.
Throw-in Brentford.
Brentford to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Brentford's Mathias Jensen gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Brentford needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
Michael Hector (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a Fulham throw-in in Brentford's half.
Goal kick for Brentford at Wembley Stadium.
Free kick Brentford.
Can Brentford capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Anthony Knockaert (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Fulham.
Brentford's Christian Norgaard has been booked in London.
Aleksandar Mitrovic (Fulham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joe Bryan is on target to give Fulham a 0-1 advantage.
Ivan Cavaleiro is on a sub for Aboubakar Kamara for Fulham.
Halil Dervisoglu is on a sub for Mathias Jensen for Brentford.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a fourth substitution, with Tarique Fosu replacing Rico Henry.
In London Brentford attack through Emiliano Marcondes. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Scott Parker is making the team's fourth substitution at Wembley Stadium with Maxime Le Marchand replacing Joshua Onomah.
Fulham make their fifth substitution with Cyrus Christie replacing Denis Odoi.
Throw-in for Brentford close to the penalty box.
Fulham will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brentford.
In London, Said Benrahma of Brentford is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Fulham's Marek Rodak looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Attention is being given to Fulhamâ€™s Marek Rodak and play has been suspended briefly.
Ethan Pinnock gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brentford.
Goal! Fulham extend their lead to 0-2 through Joe Bryan.
That's a fine assist from Aleksandar Mitrovic.
Martin Atkinson awards Fulham a goal kick.
Brentford's Henrik Dalsgaard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fulham have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd extra.
Can Brentford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Brentford are coming forward and Said Benrahma gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Free kick Brentford.
It's 1-2 at the end of extra-time.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Martin Atkinson.
Henrik Dalsgaard (Brentford) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
Christian Norgaard with an assist there.
Fulham's Marek Rodak has been booked in London.
